extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Connect4()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkFirstDiagonal()
      This method check for a win by a diagonal,top left, pattern by looping through the rows and columns
      boolean checkHorizontal()
      This method checks for a win horizontally by looping through the 2D array and checking for 4 in a row
      boolean checkSecondDiagonal()
      This method check for a win by a diagonal,top right, pattern by looping through the rows and columns
      boolean checkVertical()
      This method checks for a vertical win by looping through 2D array elements
      void currentBoard()
      This method updates connect 4 board to show user.
      boolean gameEnd()
      This method fills the game board with empty characters.
      boolean makeTurn(int col, char player)
      This method checks if the column is valid to put a chip into by the appropriate player
      boolean winnerFound()
      This method checks if there is a winner found based if any player has made a win (true) in a vertical, horizontal, or diagonal direction.
